row.entry: This module allows you to correct chromatic aberrations.

sect4.title: Usage
sect4.para: The module has no parameters. On activation it will automatically try to optimize away visible CA's.

The underlying model assumes as input a typical photographic image with radially increasing chromatic aberrations - that's what the module gets during file exports. The module is likely to fail in darkroom view when applied to a zoomed-in fraction of your image. As an exception to most other modules of darktable this one does not always let you see what you will get.
